alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 11:56PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GULF...SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EST/1130 PM CST/... At 1155 PM EST/1055 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Eastpoint to 7 miles northwest of Apalachicola to 10 miles southeast of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, High Bluff, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Indian Pass, Tilton, Beverly, Owens Bridge, Bay City, Howard Creek, Creels, Hays Place, and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
